name: Example 07: Play notification - Read me
info:
## Purpose: 
Play notification on a player an afterwards restore the origional played sound.

## Restrictions:
This is not a SONOS build in function. The current SONOS player status is captured, then the notification is played and afterwards, the status is being restored. 

If the current song has been started via an Smartphone app such as Apple or spotify, it is not possible to capture the current status and therefore the restore is not possible.

SONOS does not provide a "blocking command". So another flow with different commands, being send while a notification is playing will mess up the process. 


## Method
This flow uses a function node to serialize (queue) the incoming notifications. The status node listen on the group.play.notification and initiates playing the next notification.

name: queue
